Rooms.Name: Shiriff Post of the Eastern Shire
Northern End of a Grassy Field
Southern End of a Grassy Field
Western End of a Grassy Field
Shiriff Post of the Lower Shire
The Inn of the Green Dragon

Objects.Name: rainbow staff
Objects.Description: The rainbow staff lies here.

Objects.Name: sting
Objects.Description: Sting lies here.

Objects.Name: sign
Objects.Description: A sign demands your attention.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Welcome to the Shire.  As you enter the Shire from Haon-Dor you come underthe jurisdiction of the Thain, the peacekeeper of the Shire.  Consequently, byentering these lands you agree to obey our laws.  If you break these laws, youwill be severely punished.  We do not like riff raff in our peaceful town.The ThainPeacekeeper of the Shire

Objects.Name: pipeweed bread
Objects.Description: A loaf of pipeweed bread arouses your hunger.

Objects.Name: silvery cloak
Objects.Description: A silvery cloak lies here.

Objects.Name: one ring
Objects.Description: The One Ring is here.

Objects.Name: elven bow
Objects.Description: An elven bow lies here.

Objects.Name: mithril axe
Objects.Description: A mithril axe lies here.

Objects.Name: thain girth
Objects.Description: The girth of the thain lies here.

Objects.Name: tiny dagger
Objects.Description: A tiny dagger lies here.

Objects.Name: egg
Objects.Description: An egg lies here.

Objects.Name: bag
Objects.Description: A bag is on the floor.

Objects.Name: lantern
Objects.Description: A lantern is on the floor.

Objects.Name: bardiche long weapon
Objects.Description: A long weapon with a sharp end is on the floor.

Objects.Name: flail
Objects.Description: A flail is on the floor.

Objects.Name: sunflower golden flower
Objects.Description: A golden sunflower blooms here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This large flower is the bright golden yellow color of sunshine, beautifulsplayed petals surrounding the dark seeded center, providing a source ofnourishment as well as beauty.

Objects.Name: sunflower seeds
Objects.Description: A pile of sunflower seeds has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This little teardrop shaped seeds are dark gray and striped with white, thecrispy shell breaking easily to reveal the soft white seed.  Its salty nuttyflavour a tasty and nutritious snack.

Objects.Name: water trickle Brandywine water
Objects.Description: A trickle of water flows from the Brandywine.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This little trickle of sparkling water comes straight from the BrandywineRiver, winding its way gently through the surrounding reeds and dissipatinggradually into the well-watered grasslands.

Objects.Name: plate toad hole toad-in-the-hole
Objects.Description: A plate of toad-in-the-hole is steaming here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This steaming dish is made mainly of battered sausages, crisp brown battercurling around the succulent meat and glistening with a trickle of hot gravy.Cooked green vegetables have been arranged neatly to the side, long string beansand crisp sliced carrots.

Objects.Name: plate venison red wine
Objects.ShortDescription: a plate of venison in red wine
Objects.Description: A plate of venison in red wine is steaming here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This delicious looking meal is made from diced venison that has been simmeredwith sliced onions and carrots in a rich gravy of black pepper and red wine.  Afew stewed mushrooms sit to the side, a sprinkling of whole juniper berries andbay leaves garnishes the dish.

Objects.Name: plate suet pudding beef
Objects.ShortDescription: a plate of suet pudding with beef
Objects.Description: A plate of suet pudding with beef sits steaming here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This brown crisp battering looks perfectly made, puffy and steaming next to apile of sliced roast beef and covered with a drizzle of onion gravy.  A littlehelping of horseradish sauce sits to the side, and a sprinkling of salt coversthe dish.

Objects.Name: bowl apple crumble
Objects.Description: A bowl of apple crumble sits here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This dish is made of diced apples that have been coated with brown sugar andtossed with chopped walnuts and hazelnuts.  Baked together with a sprinkling ofporrige oats, the whole steaming mixture has been coated with a generous helpingof cold cream.

Objects.Name: bowl apricot fool
Objects.Description: A bowl of apricot fool sits here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Golden apricots have been mashed to a smooth puree and allowed to soak incool milky cream.  The soft mixture has been chilled and sprinkled with aspoonful of sugar.

Objects.Name: plate bacon roly-poly
Objects.Description: A plate of bacon roly-poly sits steaming here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This traditional dish is made with moist suet pastry, filled with choppedbacon and onion and baked slowly.  Sliced green vegetables and a deep brownsause are drizzled over the plate, a sprinkling of pepper and parsley dashedhere and there.

Objects.Name: plate bangers mash
Objects.ShortDescription: a plate of bangers and mash
Objects.Description: A plate of bangers and mash smells absolutely delicious.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Three crispy brown sausages sit side by side, nestled next to a generousdollop of fluffy white mashed potatoes.  A few slices of fried onion are laidover the dish and the whole thing coated with thick, rich gravy.

Objects.Name: bowl bread butter pudding
Objects.ShortDescription: a bowl of bread and butter pudding
Objects.Description: A bowl of bread and butter pudding is soaking here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Sliced bread has been soaked in sugared milk until completely moist and soft,dried currants and sultanas have been added to the mixture, and the whole thingtossed with brown sugar and powdered cinnamon.  The finished dish has then beenbaked slowly until golden brown.

Objects.Name: plate bubble squeak
Objects.ShortDescription: a plate of bubble and squeak
Objects.Description: A plate of bubble and squeak wafts heat into the air.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Chopped up beef has been fried together with green cabbage and mixedthoroughly into a dish of mashed potatoes.  The whole mixture has been cookeduntil set solid and the outsides a crispy golden brown.

Objects.Name: plate cauliflower cheese
Objects.Description: A plate of cauliflower cheese sits temptingly here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Pale cauliflower florets have been steamed lightly until softened and bakedin a rich cheese sauce until slightly browned.  A sprinkling of parmesan hasbeen grated over the top, and a single sprig of parsley set in the center.

Objects.Name: plate chicken kiev
Objects.Description: A plate of chicken kiev steams slowly.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A piece of succulent white chicken breast has been carefully pierced andstuffed with a stick of garlic butter and cooked slowly.  A little pile of leekssits to the side and the whole thing sprinkled with ground black pepper and adash of lemon juice.

Objects.Name: plate fried duck breast
Objects.ShortDescription: a plate of fried duck breast
Objects.Description: A plate of fried duck breast simmers with heat.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This slightly fatty piece of deep red meat has been seared with intense heatto make the skin crisp while leaving the meat tender and juicy.  A light bittergravy has been drizzled over top along with a squeeze of orange and topped witha slice of lime.

Objects.Name: scotch egg
Objects.Description: A scotch egg has been dropped here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This filling little snack has been made from a hard boiled egg which has thenhad sausage meat moulded around it and been rolled in breadcrumbs before thewhole thing is deep fried.

Objects.Name: bowl bananas custard
Objects.ShortDescription: a bowl of bananas and custard
Objects.Description: A bowl of bananas and custard has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This delicious desert has been made from sliced bananas left to simmer in hotcreamy custard.  Fine white sugar has been sprinkled over the top and a vanillapod placed in the middle for flavouring.

Objects.Name: piece sticky gingerbread
Objects.Description: A piece of sticky gingerbread is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This golden brown piece of gingerbread is soft and squidgy, made from mostlybutter and treacle and baked until set.  This particular piece has been cut inthe shape of a star and dusted with a light coat of powdered sugar.

Objects.Name: plate smoked mackerel
Objects.Description: A plate of smoked mackerel has been set here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Creamy colored mackerel meat has been cooked and mashed together with meltedbutter to make a creamy pate.  This has been sprinkled with ground black pepperand served with a tiny dollop of horseradish sauce and a crisp green side ofsalad.

Objects.Name: plate shepherd's pie
Objects.Description: A plate of shepherd's pie gives off a delicious smell.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This piping hot dish has been made from minced mutton mixed with slicedonions and carrots and fried until brown.  Salt, pepper and a little tomatopuree has been added, and the mixture covered with creamy mashed potato, bakeduntil just golden and served with a side of green beans.

Objects.Name: pickled onion
Objects.Description: A pickled onion lies on the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This very small onion is about the size of a whole walnut, peeled and scaldedbefore being left to pickle for several days in a jar of vinegar, leaving itslightly browned and very strongly flavoured.

Objects.Name: sausage roll
Objects.Description: A sausage roll lies steaming here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A slightly spiced sausage has been cooked until soft and tender and rolled ina light pastry, then baked golden and flaky.  Piping hot, it has been rolled insome brown paper for easy snacking.

Objects.Name: spotted dick bowl
Objects.Description: A bowl of spotted dick is set here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Shredded suet pastry has been tossed with breadcrumbs and raisins, seasonedwith ginger and nutmeg and packed into a bowl before being drizzled with brandyand steamed.  The hot mixture has been served with a lashing of creamy custardand some grated orange zest.

Objects.Name: plate baked gammon cider
Objects.ShortDescription: a plate of baked gammon in cider
Objects.Description: A plate of baked gammon in cider sits here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A joint of gammon has been slowly simmered in a cider sauce with choppedchives until tender.  Peach juice has been drizzled over top, and a few peachslices left to garnish the dish along with a sprig of bay leaves.

Objects.Name: plate baked flounder
Objects.Description: A plate of baked flounder smells delicious.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Two small flounders have been baked with nutmeg and herbs before beingdrizzled with white wine and melted butter.  The meat has then been rolled inbreadcrumbs and chopped chives and rebaked until browned, sprinkled with alittle parsley and tarragon.

Objects.Name: crumpet
Objects.Description: A crumpet has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A salted batter of flour and yeast has been mixed with warm milk and frieduntil golden brown and fluffy.  The cooked batter has then been spread withbutter until it has melted and absorbed into the crumpet.

Objects.Name: plate lamprey brewet
Objects.ShortDescription: a plate of lampery in brewet
Objects.Description: A plate of lamprey in brewet sits here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A piece of fresh white lamprey has been boiled in salted water and then friedin melted butter with mixed sweet herbs.  A little white wine has been added,along with a sprinkling of ground ginger, and the cooked meat served with itsown juices and a slab of hot white bread.

Objects.Name: piece lemon cake
Objects.Description: A piece of lemon cake sits here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This deliciously sweet and lemony piece of cake is a delicate yellow color,sprinkled with powdered sugar and zest of lemon, and baked until light andfluffy.

Objects.Name: plate mushroom croustades
Objects.Description: A plate of mushroom croustades is steaming here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Wholemeal rolls have been hollowed out and spread with crushed garlic,chopped rosemary and black pepper in a butter sauce.  Sliced, sauteed mushroomshave then been stuffed into the flavoured rolls and baked until golden, servedwith a side of green crisp salad.

Objects.Name: bowl treacle pudding
Objects.Description: A bowl of treacle pudding sits here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A golden tart of treacle and rich shortcrust pastry has been sprinkled withlemon juice and baked until piping hot before being drizzled with cold custardand a little lashing of golden syrup.

Objects.Name: plate skirlie mushrooms
Objects.ShortDescription: a plate of skirlie with mushrooms
Objects.Description: A plate of skirlie with mushrooms has been set here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Sliced mushrooms and onion have been fried until golden brown in good meatdripping.  The mixture has been tossed with oatmeal and browned again beforebeing seasoned with salt and black pepper.

Objects.Name: plate quails mushrooms
Objects.ShortDescription: a plate of quails on mushrooms
Objects.Description: A plate of quails on mushrooms has been set here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Two plump quails have been stuffed with finely chopped garlic, chives, andparsley, sprinkled with lemon juice before being cooked and seasoned with saltand pepper.  The cooked birds have then been set onto large grilled mushroomsand drizzled with garlic butter.

Objects.Name: hunter's knife
Objects.Description: A hunter's knife lies forgotten here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This little serrated blade has been designed for sawing through tough hidesand slabs of meat.  Neatly sharpened, the petrified wooden handle has beentightly bound with black leather, making it easier to grip.

Objects.Name: flowing purple skirt
Objects.Description: @MA flowing purple skirt@g lies on the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This long skirt is made from masses of purple fabric, making it very full andruffled indeed.  The hemline is neatly sewn with a pretty gold ribbon fordecoration.

Objects.Name: purple bodice
Objects.Description: @mA purple bodice@g lies here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This delicate bodice has been designed to tightly cinch the waist of thewearer, giving them a more hourglass figure.  Pretty celtic buttons have beenfastened to the front as decoration, long laces closing it at the back.

Objects.Name: white cotton blouse
Objects.Description: @wA white cotton blouse@g lies forgotten on the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This simple gauzy blouse is loose and airy, gathered sleeves ending at theelbow, allowing the wearer to work without soiling the cuffs.  Little woodenbuttons line the front, covered over with a seam of material and a slight rufflearound the neck.

Objects.Name: daisy chain
Objects.Description: @WA @Yd@Wa@Yi@Ws@Yy @Wc@Yh@Wa@Yi@Wn@g has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This pretty little chain is made up of flowers as white as pure snow, theirbeautifully fragranced centers the color of golden streaming sunshine.

Objects.Name: sweeping green skirt
Objects.Description: @GA sweeping green skirt@g lies crumpled here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This long velvety skirt hangs in deep sweeping folds, the long hem trimmedwith a delicate cord of gold and gathered tightly at the waist.

Objects.Name: green bodice
Objects.Description: @gA green bodice is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This deep green material is slightly velvety in feel, dark wooden buttonsrunning down either side carved with beautiful patterns.  Dark green cords lacethe material together, strong enough to cinch the wearer's waist tightly.

Objects.Name: light yellow skirt
Objects.Description: @YA light yellow skirt@g has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This brightly colored skirt is made from a very fragile and airy material,delicate veins of gold embroidered here and there and sparkling in any light.

Objects.Name: yellow bodice
Objects.Description: @yA yellow bodice@g has been dropped here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This pretty little bodice is hemmed with a delicate embroidering of gold, anddecorated with a single line of brass buttons down the front.  Strong lacingsfastening the bodice tightly at the back.

Objects.Name: flowing blue skirt
Objects.Description: @CA flowing blue skirt@g lies dropped here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Made from light silky material, this delicate blue skirt is soft and smoothto the touch, hanging in flowing folds long enough to brush the ground.

Objects.Name: blue bodice
Objects.Description: @cA blue bodice@g is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Lightly embroidered with silver thread, this blue bodice is made of a verysoft and smooth material, that nonetheless is strong enough to cinch the waisttightly, laced with several silver cords at the back.

Objects.Name: wooden crate
Objects.Description: A wooden crate stands amongst the shadows.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Made of damp and mouldy wooden boards, this crate looks more likely to fallapart than be of any use in containing its contents.  A layer of dust andcobwebs covers the grimey surface, as if this box has been left untouched for along time.

Objects.Name: string black pearls
Objects.Description: @DA string of black pearls@g lies here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Darkly beautiful, these smooth black pearls are linked with a fine silvercord that spirals elegantly around each one.  A strange sinister feeling seemsto emanate from them, as though they once belonged to a powerfully evil owner.

Objects.Name: treasure chest
Objects.Description: A treasure chest stands against the wall.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This strong wooden chest is bound with thick metal bands, keeping thecontents safely protected from all but the owner of the key.  Slight blue andgreen streaks marr the beauty of its design, growths of mould and fungusbeginning to flourish on the dark, damp wooden surface.

Objects.Name: tiny metal key
Objects.Description: A tiny metal key glints on the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This little key has been forged from a silvery metal, its once polishedsurface beginning to decay with rust and neglect, although it neverthelessappears in working order.

Objects.Name: pile gold coins
Objects.Description: A pile of gold coins glints temptingly here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Various pieces of gold lie gathered in a pile, worn with time and lack ofuse, but still obviously valuable.

Objects.Name: paladin's bejewelled shield
Objects.Description: A bejewelled shield sparkles here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This shield is inscribed with the name of Paladin Took II, and seems to bethe shield that would have been used against Lotho in the Battle of Bywater.Gilded with gold and silver, several precious gems are studded here and there,rubies, sapphires, and emeralds all testifying to the wealth and pride of theowner.

Objects.Name: chest small
Objects.Description: A small chest stands here, covered over with a dirty cloth.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This decrepit wooden chest is made from dark mouldy boards, almost completelyrotted away with various fungi, and the continual dampness that has soakedthrough the wood.

Objects.Name: old skeleton
Objects.Description: An old skeleton lies crumpled here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This intact pile of bones is obviously the long decayed form of a hobbit,seeming proof that murder exists even amongst these normally peace-lovingpeople.  There is no telling how long this skeleton has been here, although thethick layer of dust seems to indicate many years.
